text: @HoarseWisperer @realDonaldTrump It is a drug of 60 years. The safety is proven. The virus causes inflammation in multiple tissues that causes death, this drug is anti inflammation, doctors have successfully used it for COVID-19 treatment. No  need to hear media's BS.
